item.title: Low cost topic classification
item.description: I implemented an algorithm based on a research paper and developed a streamlit app on top of it. The algorithm performs topic classifcation based on the idea of a compression algorithm, a distance metric and also KNN algorithm. Here is the link to the app: https://low-cost-classification.streamlit.app/ Feel free to use it!

item.title: Statistical drift detection
item.description: I developed an app to detect covariate drift based on simple statistical methods. The app is up on streamlit cloud: https://statistical-data-drift-detection.streamlit.app/ Feel free to try it!

item.title: About me
item.description: Hello! Welcome to my blog. My name is Albert Wibowo. I am a machine learning scientist with MLOps experience under the belt. I hold an Economics and Statistics degree from the University of Edinburgh. I have been working as a machine learning scientist for 5 years. I started my journey in a consultancy before moving to a scale-up tech company. I am passionate about machine learning and writing. I aim to use this blog to share my personal projects and also my articles.
